title: How to Plant and Manage Summer Trap Crops

tasks.task: Planting and maintaining trap crops for insect pest management on a small farm.
Attending educational and training resources for pest management.
Planting and maintaining trap crops for pest control on a small farm.
Subtasks under MAINTASK will involve specifics like crop selection, timing, planting methods, monitoring, and disposal.
Attending extension meetings and field days.
